title: Fire in the Sacred Grove
description: A fire broke out last night in one of the oldest elven forests. The cause is unknown, but online accusations point toward dwarven miners.

title: Magical Eavesdropping Scandal
description: Leaked reports reveal the Altian Council used magical surveillance during meetings with other factions. The public demands answers.

title: Elven Princess Joins TikTrelf
description: The young elven princess launches her TikTrelf account and goes viral supporting magical education reform.

title: Dwarves Protest Beer-Magic Ban
description: A new law banning alcohol as a spell component has triggered mass protests among dwarves, calling it an attack on tradition.

title: Orc Warchief Supports Peace Treaty
description: In a surprise statement, the Warchief of the Southern Horde announces support for peace talks with the human kingdoms.

title: Magical Plague in Frostmere
description: A strange illness spreads through Frostmere, reportedly caused by unstable spell residue. Local healers are overwhelmed.

title: Sky Rains Frogs Over Drakmire
description: Residents of Drakmire report frogs falling from the sky. Monks claim it’s a divine omen. Others aren’t so sure.

title: Unicorn Spotted in Silvergrove
description: A unicorn was seen grazing near Silvergrove. The event has sparked hope and pilgrimage across the land.

title: Golem Rampage in Ironhall
description: A rogue golem malfunctioned and caused massive damage in Ironhall. Dwarven engineers are investigating.

title: Human Clerics Launch Potion Tax
description: The High Church has introduced a tax on healing potions, sparking outrage among commoners and adventurers alike.

title: Wizard Accidentally Turns Himself Into a Chair
description: A senior wizard from Arcana Collegium miscast a polymorph spell and is now stuck as a very comfortable armchair.

title: Orc Influencer Starts Beard-Braiding Trend
description: Krogmaw the Bold, orc warrior and influencer, sparks a fashion frenzy with his elaborate beard braids. Even elves are copying it.

title: Royal Dragon Sleeps on Public Library Roof
description: A retired dragon has taken to napping on the roof of the Grand Library in Dawnspire, claiming 'the tiles are warm'.

title: Gnomes Invent Singing Mailboxes
description: Tinkering gnomes in Gearhold have unveiled singing mailboxes. Reactions range from amused to extremely annoyed.

title: Bard Wins Duel with Power Ballad
description: Instead of swords, two duelists agreed to settle their score through musical performance. The bard’s power ballad left no dry eyes.

title: Goat Elected Mayor in Small Village
description: Residents of Mudhollow accidentally voted for a goat named Sir Cheddar during a local election. Approval ratings are high.

title: Magical Mirror Spills Gossip in Town Square
description: A cursed mirror was placed in public by accident, revealing embarrassing secrets to passing pedestrians.

title: Potion of Invisibility Causes Traffic Jam
description: A shipment of invisibility potions spilled onto the streets of Valendor, causing a massive pile-up of invisible carts.

title: Elven Squirrel Appointed Forest Warden
description: In an act of symbolic diplomacy, the elves of Elaria have named a highly intelligent squirrel their Forest Warden.

title: Cursed Lute Won't Stop Playing Polka
description: A cursed instrument recovered from a sunken ruin plays nothing but loud polka music—and can’t be silenced.
